Text: CONTINUATION: Dan Brown’s bestselling novels have ignited both controversy and outrage, but how much of their stories of centuries-old clandestine societies and papal scandals are based on truth? What dark secrets of the Illuminati, the Freemasons, Galileo and the Church itself remain untold? Investigate the fascinating truths behind Brown’s first novel, from ancient secret societies to real-world cryptography, from the high-stakes intrigue surrounding the installation of a new Pope to the occasionally uneasy relationship between the Vatican and leading scientists, in this revealing special from HISTORY™.
